meanings.definition: The quality of being distinguishable or unique.
meanings.sent1: The distinctivenesses of her artwork set her apart from other artists.
meanings.sent2: The distinctivenesses of each snowflake amazed the children.
meanings.sent3: The distinctivenesses of the clown's outfit made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The distinctivenesses of her voice echoed through the auditorium.
meanings.sent5: The distinctivenesses of the rare flower captured everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The state of being easily recognized or identified.
meanings.sent1: The distinctivenesses of his hat made him easy to spot in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The distinctivenesses of the logo made the brand instantly recognizable.
meanings.sent3: The distinctivenesses of the cat's meow always made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The distinctivenesses of the scent brought back memories of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The distinctivenesses of the landmark guided them back to the campsite.
